en: You awaken with butterflies in your stomach. You've prepared for the entire month. Surely this will be enough?
You arrive to the conference room early and have a few minutes to gather your thoughts. You stride around the room to get your bearings, then hear footsteps approach down the hall.
Dominique Martel is an intimidating presence. You've never seen a millionaire in real life, and instead of a gaudy old man covered in gold, you find a tastefully-dressed Frenchman.
He shakes your hand with a smile and makes some small talk while he takes his seat. Then you take a deep breath. It's time.

You flow through the presentation as though you've through it a thousand times. Throughout, Dominique asks piercing questions, but you've given thought to the majority of them already. The rest you pause to consider, then answer with confidence.
After finishing, Dominique takes a few minutes to consider you. Just when you start to sweat, he smiles.
dominique::"I see so much of myself in you. I was young, ambitious, and confident. I had little to my name and nothing to stop me from throwing myself against a brick wall. And throw I did!"
His laugh fills the entire room.
dominique::"What I didn't have back then was help. Guidance. And this is something I now want to offer you. Not just help with funding, but help with entrepreneurship. What do you say?"
It's all you can do to stutter out an agreement. He beams and clasps your hand.
dominique::"Then I will be in touch! For now, I must get to the airport. Thanks again, #NAME. May this be the start of something wonderful."
The gravitas of the situation hits you all at once. Suddenly, you see the man before you less as a savior and more as a warden. If you agree here, you will be bound to that agreement.
And you actually don't want that.
He leaves for his flight, and you leave for home. Maybe you weren't as serious about this as you thought.
